channel.title: nEeD mAjOr HeLp PleAsE!
channel.description:
There are major things i need help with. 1.makeing your own commands 2.spawning objects 3.making npc's talk 4.if somebody clicks over 7 times in 1 secound the server will say "(player's name) is massing the server" 5.changeing the starting location when a ne wplayer logs on
Please help thanks for your time....
NOTE:do not flame me cuz i am a noob.

item.title: nEeD mAjOr HeLp PleAsE!
item.dc:creator: @croranger croranger
item.description:
@croranger wrote:

i can help u in all

5 - starting place - go to player.java and search for

		// the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet

under it u will see

teleportToX = xCOORD;//.; teleportToY = yCOORD;//.;

change x and y coords to coords where u want to be starting place

2 - spawning objects - u need fedexers global objects if u have it go to client.java and search for public void NewObjects() {

and under it u will see other objects u add them there

1 - own commands - This is command to give u xp in skill u want.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMANDNAME") && playerRights >= 1) { addSkillXP(SKILLXPUWANT, SKILLNUMBER); addSkillXP(SKILLXPUWANT, SKILLNUMBER);

playerRights >= 1) this means that only mods and admins and owners can use that command

                  - This is command to give u items

if (command.startsWith("COMMANDNAME") addItem(ITEMID, AMOUNT); addItem(ITEMID, AMOUNT); 

                 - This command teles u somewhere

if (command.startsWith("COMMANDNAME")) { teleportToX = xCOORDS; teleportToY = yCOORDS; }

3 - making npc talk - go to npchandler.java and search for moo

under the last } add if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if (misc.random2(50) >= 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "MESSAGEYOUWANT"; } }

SKILL NUMBERS:

0 - Attack 1 - Str 2 - Defence 3 - Hp 4 - Ranged 5 - Prayer 6 - Magic 7 - Cooking 8 - Woodcutting 9 - Fletching 10 - Fishing 11 - Firemaking 12 - Crafting 13 - Smithing 14 - Mining 15 - Herblore 16 - Agility 17 - Thieving 18 - Slayer 19 - Farming 20 - Runecrafting

P.S.U NEED TO ADD NPC IN AUTOSPAWN TOO WHEN U WANT HIM TO TALK - HOPE IT HELPED

Read full topic
